links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: bf[n_,k_]:=Module[{s=ToString[BaseForm[n,k]]},ToExpression[StringDrop[s,{Part[StringPosition[s,"\n"],1,1],-1}]]] lst={};Do[f=bf[Fibonacci[n],4];AppendTo[lst,f],{n,0,4*4!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 17 2009 *)FromDigits[IntegerDigits[#,4]]&/@Fibonacci[Range[0,30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 24 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
